titles.title: A resolution commending the University of Wyoming Cowgirls for their championship victory in the Women's National Invitation Tournament.
A resolution commending the University of Wyoming Cowgirls for their championship victory in the Women's National Invitation Tournament.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Commends the University of Wyoming Cowgirls for winning the Women's National Invitation Tournament basketball championship.
